title: New: Lost Twin – Where it Hurts
content:
Photo by Stephanie Mill

Simplicity; I could talk about it all day. For me, it’s the belief in an idea combined with the ability to explore and run with it, failing to be distracted by the incoming assault of injecting musing.

Where it Hurts is one of those tracks, build on a deep, squelchy melody, with tactile and confronting beats surrounding it, its result is a somber and remarkable little arrangement of music.

Where it Hurts is taken from Lost Twin’s new LP, Birds.

Via ZZZap.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
